de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore

Interface DataReceiverAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractTransmissionAdapter

    public interface DataReceiverAdapter
extends AbstractTransmissionAdapter
    An adapter interface to control a DataReceiver an its DataReceiverConnections.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    chrwuer

    • Method Detail

      • downloadStarted

        java.io.OutputStream downloadStarted(TransmissionEvent e,
                                   java.lang.String clientId)
        Called before the transmission starts.
        Parameters:
        e - the TransmissionEvent describing the DataReceiverConnection's state
        clientId - the client id of the sender or null if no id is available
        Returns:
        the OutputStream to which the received data will be written

      • closeOutputStream

        void closeOutputStream(TransmissionEvent e,
                     java.io.OutputStream out)
        Called after the transmission is done. You may close the given OutputStream which was originally created in downloadStarted(TransmissionEvent, String), or leave it open for further operations.
        Parameters:
        e - the TransmissionEvent describing the DataReceiverConnection's state
        out - the OutputStream in which the received data was written (created in downloadStarted(TransmissionEvent, String)
